html: (6) The Lord hath a sacrifice in Bozrah . . .—Two cities of this name appear in history; one in the Haurân, more or less conspicuous in ecclesiastical history, and the other, of which Isaiah now speaks, in Edom. It was a strongly fortified city, and is named again and again. (Comp. Isaiah 63:1 ; Amos 1:12; Jeremiah 49:13; Jeremiah 49:22 .) The image both of the sword and the sacrifice appears in Jeremiah 46:10 .
